channel.title: Wtf!?
channel.description: When i try log in my server, it shows this in the client cmd box, [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at RSString.method1612(RSString.java:856) at Class21.method336(Class21.java:188) at Class21.method350(Class21.java:520) at Class61.method598(Class61.java:337) at client.method33(client.java:767) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:572) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:156) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] any way to fix??
